name: Breakdown (itch) (Rainier Dancel)
description:
Breakdown

The Game: a layer of bricks lines the top third of the screen. A ball travels across the screen, bouncing off the top and side walls of the screen. When a brick is hit, the ball bounces away and the brick is destroyed. The player loses a turn when the ball touches the bottom of the screen. To prevent this from happening, the player has a movable paddle to bounce the ball upward, keeping it in play

Almost the same with a Breakout game with few messing around in the gameplay. the Game was created in Unity3D as a mobile game, but just for experiment this is the web build version of the game. it's just a student project game so feel free to test the game (please note) the game still has a few bugs.

it may require a Unity3D installed

controls:

use mouse to move the paddle
